Texts.Chs:
摄入这种“水果”会在短时间内提高您的智力，却降低防御能力。
^yellow;^reset;^cyan;研究加成^reset;: ^cyan;+3 ^reset;,^red;-50%^reset;^cyan;防御^reset;, 120s,
Texts.Eng:
Ingesting this 'fruit' increases your intellect for a short time at the expense of defense. 
^yellow;^reset;^cyan;Research Bonus^reset;: ^cyan;+3 ^reset;, ^red;-50%^reset;, ^cyan;Protection^reset;, 120s
